Title: Town-In-A-Box: Under Attack
Description:
$n, you have to defend us!

I had the eggheads deploy the town's cannon defenses, but it seems like there's an unlimited supply of these Oomlot warriors!

Get your behind into one of those B.C. Eliminators and eliminate the pygmy threat to the town!
ObjectivesText: Use a B.C. Eliminator to defeat 30 Oomlot Warriors.
CompletionText: That's not enough, hon. Can you take care of more of them?
RewardText:
Okay, I think that's good enough for now, but they took a bunch of the townsfolk captive.

We're going to have to take the fight to them!
